fact: The growth of AI startups accelerated 14-fold since 2000.
Business leaders trust AI's power in driving growth.
The global AI market is booming. It is projected to reach $407 billion by 2027.
By 2030, Artificial Intelligence will add 15.7 trillion dollars to the world's GDP, boosting it by 14 percent.
AI is already being used to improve healthcare, transportation, education, and many other industries.
AI is still in its early stages of development, but it has the potential to revolutionize the way we live and work.
Some people are concerned that AI will eventually become too intelligent and pose a threat to humanity.
Others believe that AI will be a force for good in the world, helping us to solve some of our biggest challenges.
AI pets exist. There are companies that develop AI-powered pets for companionship and entertainment.
Most AI bots are female because the majority of AI engineers are male and design bots reflecting their gender preferences.
AI can recognize emotions by analyzing facial expressions, tone of voice, and body language.
AI can repair itself using machine learning to identify and fix errors in its code.
AI can replace the human workforce in industries like manufacturing and customer service.
AI might become smarter than humans, depending on its development and utilization.
Humans can develop romantic relationships with AI, though it's still very rare.
In some countries like China and Saudi Arabia, AI has nationalities and passports.
